summary: The birth of modern stand-up comedy began in the Catskill Mountains - a boot camp for the greatest generation of Jewish-American comedians.
cast: Robert Klein|Jerry Lewis|Sid Caesar|Jackie Mason|Larry King|Mort Sahl|Jerry Stiller|Mickey Freeman|Dick Gregory|Hugh Hefner|Dick Capri|Amy Stiller|Wendy Liebman|Cory Kahaney|Marc Maron|Darryl Lenox|Sandy Hackett|Joe Franklin|Jack Benny|Milton Berle|David Brenner|Lenny Bruce|Red Buttons|Jack Carter|Myron Cohen|Norm Crosby|Rodney Dangerfield|Lawrence J. Epstein|Totie Fields|Shecky Greene|Buddy Hackett|Mary K. Jordan|Gabe Kaplan|Danny Kaye|Alan King|Bill Maher|Jan Murray|Dennis Ostermaier|Joan Rivers|Dick Shawn|Henny Youngman
title: When Comedy Went to School
